about_the_game:
In a world where organic life has long since perished, ReSetna is awakened by APEX AI to confront the growing threat of the mysterious Signal. As the Signal spreads chaos, disrupting the balance of the world and driving robots to madness, ReSetna, a combat-ready robot with advanced technology, must uncover the truth behind this disturbance and eliminate the Signal’s influence. With her loyal drone companion IXA, ReSetna traverses a crumbling world, piecing together the secrets of Project Ascendance while battling fierce enemies and uncovering a dark history.

Explore 20+ hours of ReSetna.

    

  • Explore a Rich, Post-Apocalyptic World: From the haunting remnants of Polis_13 to the toxic expanses of Acidia, journey through distinct, dystopian zones, each filled with secrets, unique challenges, and lore, inviting deep exploration and discovery.

  • Rich Narrative and Lore: Piece together clues to discover the complicated history of this enigmatic world. Each zone holds keys to the past and hints of the future, through environmental storytelling and cryptic communications.

  • Tactical Combat with Diverse Enemies: Engage with a wide array of enemies in each zone. Each will challenge you to adapt your strategy and refine your combat skills. Tactical thinking is key to mastering ReSetna’s arsenal and overcoming adversaries.

  • Dynamic Companion – IXA: IXA, your loyal drone companion, will be an essential aid, providing healing in critical moments.

  • Epic Boss Battles: The ultimate test of your skills! Each formidable boss is an epic, intense showdown requiring a sound strategy to beat. Their unique abilities will require you stay on your toes, exploit their weaknesses, and leverage upgrades to survive.

  • Character Progression: A customizable chip-upgrade system lets you customize ReSetna to suit your playstyle. Whether enhancing her combat techniques or her abilities to manipulate her environment, your choices affect her evolution and how you overcome obstacles.

  • 7 demanding districts: Every environment presents a challenging terrain demanding keen observation and platforming abilities. You'll encounter mechanisms and hazards, as well as opportunities to uncover hidden rooms and secret passages that offer unique rewards and deeper insight into the world's history.

In a world where organic life has long since perished, ReSetna is awakened by APEX AI to confront the growing threat of the mysterious Signal. As the Signal spreads chaos, disrupting the balance of the world and driving robots to madness, ReSetna, a combat-ready robot with advanced technology, must uncover the truth behind this disturbance and eliminate the Signal’s influence. With her loyal drone companion IXA, ReSetna traverses a crumbling world, piecing together the secrets of Project Ascendance while battling fierce enemies and uncovering a dark history.

  • Character Progression: A customizable chip-upgrade system lets you customize ReSetna to suit your playstyle. Whether enhancing her combat techniques or her abilities to manipulate her environment, your choices affect her evolution and how you overcome obstacles.

  • 7 demanding districts: Every environment presents a challenging terrain demanding keen observation and platforming abilities. name: ReSetna

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 or AMD FX 8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • Storage: 25 GB available space

pegi.descriptors: The game contains depictions of violence. In games rated PEGI 7 this can only be non-realistic or non-detailed violence.

reviews:
“As a huge fan of Metroidvanias, Resetna has definitely piqued my interest. The game’s clean visuals, visceral combat, and intriguing narrative have me ready to bust up some bots and silence that Signal, whatever the cost!”
Gamer Social Club

“Very exciting and interesting metroidvania with an engaging setting, that should scratch the itch for players of Hollow Knight.”
9/10 – Mason Lee Hill, Canada

“There is a flourishing variety of mini bosses, heavy enemies and light enemies, which leads to the gameplay not becoming stale at all.”
10/10 – Apostolos Karadakis, Greece
short_description: ReSetna is an action-adventure with fast-paced combat and intense battles set in a fractured, post-apocalyptic world. Fight through hordes of corrupted machines, upgrade your abilities, traverse treacherous environments and explore to uncover the truth of what happened.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
